documents.document: I'm on a rooftop carpark. Can anyone explain the point of this crossing? https://t.co/AM5gAmJWEu
@vickiewoodsford what's the one back right?
@howardparsons74 this is a 'wearable'. Tracks loads of metrics when running, swimming or cycling. Wouldn't be without it.
Garmin inexplicably set to miles not KM. I have just run 17km of the most hateful mental arithmetic ever.
No idea what this is but it was 75p in the supermarket. https://t.co/jWFTwMRWf5
@vickiewoodsford yep. We're there pretty much every saturday am for a structured session. So the drowny looking bits - technique building!
I've managed to catch an earlier train. It is packed, it never ceases to be amaze me the number of people who feel their bag needs a seat.
Going by the price I assume there's one of the new limited edition solid gold jewel encrusted Toblerone in the mini bar fridge.
Hello Wembley! https://t.co/RyhdZVfRFZ
I'm in Notting Hill. I've seen Richard Curtis and just paid £3.75 for a sausage roll. Standard.
@morleybonez I'm working in one of the better parts of London. It's an actual thing here. Italian stuff.
@oxfordgirlie I'm in a hilton. Can you guess what's missing from this picture? https://t.co/heaDFKcgWa
No dancing tonight on account of being in Surrey. Mrs B didn't go. No idea what they did but it's 2 weeks to the big band dance.
Swam in a teeny tiny hotel pool tonight. It had 'a jet' which was supposed to create an endless pool. It didnt.
@firsthurdle I thinking traffic may have a slightly regulating effect.
Waiting for a take away ordered via nus eat. It's late which is fine. But annoyed I'm having to chase it when they have my phone number etc.
@firsthurdle I'm not sure what to do about swim time for Brecon.
@firsthurdle well done. What time did you put for Cardiff?
@firsthurdle I think I'm most excited about the window sticker.
@Debbos is this your house? https://t.co/fNTxKVOxdx
@morleybonez tiny bit of Karma!
@morleybonez very happy for you.
@morleybonez view from platform 1 this am. https://t.co/K5pk194Di6
@RuthLeeds in fairness Ruth I'm like that every morning. It's just usually a lot worse following a big race.
Just bumped into my sister in the station. Which was nice.
Tiniest touch of the post race John Wayne walk with the first few steps of the morning. But it really is all good today.
@Ben_Blackman @UKRunChat I had similar. Local physio told me I could continue running (with some stretching). Money well spent.
@morleybonez I've got tables like that in my front garden!!!!!!
@_Dunedal conditions were pretty miserable.
@_Dunedal 59:32, missed a pb by 7 seconds. My fault should've checked what time I was shooting for. Pleased, all things considered.
@_Dunedal how did you get on this morning? (I mean the race rather than the double breakfast)
@morleybonez I am incredibly envious right now.
@morleybonez its effing awful in the diff.
@claireinwales @firsthurdle @stokesie84 cold, wet, miserable. Missed a pb by about seven seconds. All things considered loved it.
@morleybonez drizzle? Showers?
Racing tomorrow. Haribo for breakfast!
@vickiewoodsford have you not been watching the news? Wall building is very much a no-no right now.
@howardparsons74 it's a home made takeaway with all of the elements that make the real thing so tasty removed or replaced.
We've just 'enjoyed' a fakeaway.
@morleybonez @Debbos I did an actual swear then. Most of it is taken up with ironing board too!
@PICollard I'm not sure what would have failed me 1st, mind or body. Very well done. Any news on your op?
@PICollard THREE AND A HALF HOURS!?!?
@_Dunedal you've clearly seen mine rider for tomorrow.
@_Dunedal it was the last one in the shop. I promise.
I've bought a new suitcase. It has 4 wheels. Once upon a time suitcases didn't have any wheels. We managed.
Wasn't going to run a spring half marathon. Was then offered a free place in the Bath Half. Now I'm running a spring half. #idiot #cantsayno
@morleybonez @Debbos curiouser and curiouser.
@morleybonez @Debbos but apart from the tiny room, overpriced cuddly toy and shower in the middle of the room, its all good, yes?
What should I be watching on netflix?
Everyone is out. I have the house to myself. Won't see the kids till tonight and Mrs B till tomorrow. I'm extraordinarily bored.
@AirManofNote have you got a new instrument or effect or something. It sounds very different? (Not a complaint BTW)
@RuthLeeds just stick at it you'll be amazed at the progress you make.
@RuthLeeds that's completely brilliant Ruth!
Text book dicking about with panorama mode this morning. https://t.co/cbtRiYJqVT
My marshalling view point. https://t.co/mHwhKy8WtX
White rock runners providing all of the volunteers at Barry Island parkrun this #thankyoumarshal.
Barry Island sunrise from Marco's. https://t.co/AtoK0o6ZAl
Not sure what has made me happier, seeing a man mowing the roof of Gloucester Services or being able to tweet about… https://t.co/hHbbPzjqIZ
@firsthurdle Yes Ma'am! Usual rules apply keep me posted on your travel plans.
@claireinwales I also successfully appealed a parking ticket last week.
Slimmer of the month. I win fridge magnets!
@KulaBeth ignore me. I read that wrong.
@KulaBeth are you going to Finland?
@morleybonez @ kulabeth got me a Portland. It doesn't get more kook than portland.
#Wednesdayweighin 1.5 off
@morleybonez nope, but theyve gone.right to.the top of my to.do list.
Sign for Lichfield.
@_Dunedal cake too!
@_Dunedal yep. Flat, fast and I suppose because it has a very limited entry.
@_Dunedal have you done it before?
@_Dunedal I like it. A pure 10k seems to be the rarer distance. Are you ready for Lliswerry?
Day trip to the Democratic Republic of Birmingham tomorrow. Early alarm to avoid traffic. Couldn't keep my eyes open earlier, now wide awake
@_Dunedal standard distance for our Thursday club run. (Round the bay)
@crispypancake49 back in the day I passed my WSET professional certificate in spirits. Who knew it would come in so useful!
@crispypancake49 from memory it is the blue agave plant. (I used to work in the drinks industry)
@wilkes66 appeal it.
@PICollard not sure. I've just downloaded the manual. I bet it's a case of something being slightly out of alignment. Would love to fix it.
@PICollard I might have to dig the manual out and troubleshoot it now I know it is possible.
@PICollard I've got one. It only picks up cadence. It's only ever done speed and distance one. Drives me mad.
@PICollard how are you recording/calculating speed and distance on your turbo?
I'm clearly getting old. I've just got in, but before locking up I had make sure the kids were home too.
Really rather chuffed. https://t.co/G4qW11xZ6L
@morleybonez dig deep. You'll get through it.
@morleybonez quite a big step up from the loo roll holder (and a blind?) if I remember correctly.
@morleybonez what's he broken?
@gaztri some.agreed lane sharing etiquette would be a good start.
@gaztri a bit extreme, but you do wonder what people are thinking when the pool is busy.
There is a special place in hell reserved for the swimmer who gets into a shared lane of front crawlers and starts swimming breaststroke.
#wednesdayweighin 3.5 off.
@morleybonez may have mentioned this before, they are affectionately known as toffee-fifi at ours. A mispronunciation by a very young Alice!
Ballroom news. More tango. We learned 'Back Corté'. A quarter turn in 4 steps starting with a male backward step. Tango continues to rock.
@morleybonez in fairness its not all your hair.
@LyndaDavidson22 they look alright. I've never been a fan of the HEB cake type things. Do they pass the taste test?
Bit of a surprise when my Hilton app invited me to check in for my stay in Surrey tomorrow as I'd meant to book for the 30th. All sorted now
Binge watching "A Series Of Unfortunate Events". It's rather good.
@RuthLeeds I'm sure you'll improve on that next week!
@RuthLeeds #dfyb I'll hopefully see you down there. If I don't, enjoy it and accept this is how Saturday mornings will now be spent.
@RuthLeeds I promise you won't be last.
@firsthurdle in and working local so if you want picking up from a station just shout.
@Debbos i don't think I'll be digging the car out in the am. Sadly it's pretty much clear skies.
